mbean.name: ContextConfig
mbean.description: Startup event listener for a Context that configures the properties of that Context, and the associated defined servlets

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

mbean.name: ContextEnvironment
mbean.description: Representation of an application environment entry

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: The description of this environment entry

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of this environment entry

attribute.name: override
attribute.description: Does this environment entry allow overrides by the application deployment descriptor

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of this environment entry

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The value of this environment entry

mbean.name: ContextResource
mbean.description: Representation of a resource reference for a web application

attribute.name: auth
attribute.description: The authorization requirement for this resource

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: The description of this resource

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of this resource

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: The sharing scope of this resource factory

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of this environment entry

mbean.name: ContextResourceLink
mbean.description: Representation of a resource link for a web application

attribute.name: global
attribute.description: The global name of this resource

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of this resource

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of this resource

mbean.name: EngineConfig
mbean.description: Startup event listener for a Engine that configures the properties of that Engine, and the associated defined contexts

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

mbean.name: FileLogger
mbean.description: Implementation of Logger that appends log messages to a file

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: directory
attribute.description: The directory in which log files are created

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: The prefix that is added to log file filenames

attribute.name: suffix
attribute.description: The suffix that is added to log file filenames

attribute.name: timestamp
attribute.description: Should logged messages be date/time stamped?

attribute.name: verbosity
attribute.description: The verbosity level for above which log messages may be filtered

mbean.name: Group
mbean.description: Group from a user database

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Description of this group

attribute.name: groupname
attribute.description: Group name of this group

attribute.name: roles
attribute.description: MBean Names of roles for this group

attribute.name: users
attribute.description: MBean Names of user members of this group

operation.name: addRole
operation.description: Add a new authorized role for this group

parameter.name: role
parameter.description: Role to be added

operation.name: removeRole
operation.description: Remove an old authorized role for this group

parameter.name: role
parameter.description: Role to be removed

operation.name: removeRoles
operation.description: Remove all authorized roles for this group

mbean.name: HostConfig
mbean.description: Startup event listener for a Host that configures the properties of that Host, and the associated defined contexts

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: configClass
attribute.description: The Java class name of the Context configuration class we should use

attribute.name: contextClass
attribute.description: The Java class name of the Context implementation we should use

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

mbean.name: Http10Connector
mbean.description: HTTP/1.0 Connector for Tomcat Standalone

attribute.name: acceptCount
attribute.description: The accept count for this Connector

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: The IP address on which to bind

attribute.name: bufferSize
attribute.description: The input buffer size we should create on input streams

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: connectionTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: enableLookups
attribute.description: The 'enable DNS lookups' flag for this Connector

attribute.name: maxProcessors
attribute.description: The maximum number of processors allowed

attribute.name: minProcessors
attribute.description: The minimum number of processors to start at initialization time

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: TCP port number to listen on

attribute.name: proxyName
attribute.description: The server name to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: proxyPort
attribute.description: The server port to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: redirectPort
attribute.description: The redirect port for non-SSL to SSL redirects

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: Protocol name for this Connector (http, https)

attribute.name: secure
attribute.description: Is this a secure (SSL) Connector?

attribute.name: allowChunking
attribute.description: Flag which indicates if HTTP/1.1 chunking transfer encoding can be used

attribute.name: bufferSize
attribute.description: The input buffer size we should create on input streams

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: connectionTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: debug

attribute.name: enableLookups

attribute.name: maxProcessors
attribute.description: The maximum number of processors allowed

attribute.name: minProcessors
attribute.description: The minimum number of processors to start at initialization time

attribute.name: port

attribute.name: proxyName
attribute.description: The server name to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: proxyPort
attribute.description: The server port to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: redirectPort
attribute.description: The redirect port for non-SSL to SSL redirects

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: Protocol name for this Connector (http, https)

mbean.name: JAASRealm
mbean.description: Implmentation of Realm that authenticates users via the Java Authentication and Authorization Service (JAAS)

attribute.name: appName
attribute.description: The application name passed to the JAAS LoginContext, which uses it to select the set of relevant LoginModules

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: digest
attribute.description: Digest algorithm used in storing passwords in a non-plaintext format

attribute.name: roleClassNames
attribute.description: Comma-delimited list of javax.security.Principal classes that represent security roles

attribute.name: userClassNames
attribute.description: Comma-delimited list of javax.security.Principal classes that represent individual users

attribute.name: validate
attribute.description: Should we validate client certificate chains when they are presented?

mbean.name: JDBCRealm
mbean.description: Implementation of Realm that works with any JDBC supported database

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: connectionName
attribute.description: The connection username to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: connectionPassword
attribute.description: The connection URL to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: connectionURL
attribute.description: The connection URL to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: digest
attribute.description: Digest algorithm used in storing passwords in a non-plaintext format

attribute.name: driverName
attribute.description: The JDBC driver to use

attribute.name: roleNameCol
attribute.description: The column in the user role table that names a role

attribute.name: userCredCol
attribute.description: The column in the user table that holds the user's credentials

attribute.name: userNameCol
attribute.description: The column in the user table that holds the user's username

attribute.name: userRoleTable
attribute.description: The table that holds the relation between user's and roles

attribute.name: userTable
attribute.description: The table that holds user data

mbean.name: JDBCUserDatabase
mbean.description: JDBC based user and group database

attribute.name: groups
attribute.description: MBean Names of all defined groups

attribute.name: roles
attribute.description: MBean Names of all defined roles

attribute.name: users
attribute.description: MBean Names of all defined users

operation.name: createGroup
operation.description: Create new group and return MBean name

parameter.name: groupname
parameter.description: Group name of the new group

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Description of the new group

operation.name: createRole
operation.description: Create new role and return MBean name

parameter.name: rolename
parameter.description: Role name of the new role

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Description of the new role

operation.name: createUser
operation.description: Create new user and return MBean name

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: User name of the new user

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password of the new user

parameter.name: fullName
parameter.description: Full name of the new user

operation.name: findGroup
operation.description: Return MBean Name of the specified group (if any)

parameter.name: groupname
parameter.description: Group name of the requested group

operation.name: findRole
operation.description: Return MBean Name of the specified role (if any)

parameter.name: rolename
parameter.description: Role name of the requested role

operation.name: findUser
operation.description: Return MBean Name of the specified user (if any)

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: User name of the requested user

operation.name: removeGroup
operation.description: Remove existing group (and all user memberships)

parameter.name: groupname
parameter.description: Group name of the group to remove

operation.name: removeRole
operation.description: Remove existing role

parameter.name: rolename
parameter.description: Role name of the role to remove

operation.name: removeUser
operation.description: Remove existing user (and all group memberships)

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: User name of the user to remove

operation.name: save
operation.description: Save current users and groups to persistent storage

mbean.name: JNDIRealm
mbean.description: Implementation of Realm that works with a directory server accessed via the Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) APIs

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: connectionName
attribute.description: The connection username for the server we will contact

attribute.name: connectionPassword
attribute.description: The connection password for the server we will contact

attribute.name: connectionURL
attribute.description: The connection URL for the server we will contact

attribute.name: contextFactory
attribute.description: The JNDI context factory for this Realm

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: digest
attribute.description: Digest algorithm used in storing passwords in a non-plaintext format

attribute.name: roleBase
attribute.description: The base element for role searches

attribute.name: roleName
attribute.description: The name of the attribute containing roles held elsewhere

attribute.name: roleSearch
attribute.description: The message format used to select roles for a user

attribute.name: roleSubtree
attribute.description: Should we search the entire subtree for matching memberships?

attribute.name: userBase
attribute.description: The base element for user searches

attribute.name: userPassword
attribute.description: The attribute name used to retrieve the user password

attribute.name: userPattern
attribute.description: The message format used to select a user

attribute.name: userRoleName
attribute.description: The name of the attribute in the user's entry containing roles for that user

attribute.name: userSearch
attribute.description: The message format used to search for a user

attribute.name: userSubtree
attribute.description: Should we search the entire subtree for matching users?

mbean.name: NamingResources
mbean.description: Holds and manages the naming resources defined in the J2EE Enterprise Naming Context and their associated JNDI context

attribute.description: MBean Names of the set of defined environment entries for this web application

attribute.name: resources
attribute.description: MBean Names of all the defined resource references for this application.

attribute.name: resourceLinks
attribute.description: MBean Names of all the defined resource link references for this application.

parameter.name: resourceName
parameter.description: New resource reference name

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: New resource reference type

operation.name: addResourceLink

parameter.name: resourceLinkName

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: New resource reference type

operation.name: removeEnvironment

parameter.description: Name of the environment entry to remove

parameter.description: Name of the resource reference to remove

operation.name: removeResourceLink

parameter.name: resourceLinkName

mbean.name: StandardManager
mbean.description: Standard implementation of the Manager interface

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.description: The message digest algorithm to be used when generating session identifiers

attribute.name: randomFile
attribute.description: File source of random - /dev/urandom or a pipe

attribute.name: checkInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between checks for expired sessions

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: distributable
attribute.description: The distributable flag for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: entropy
attribute.description: A String initialization parameter used to increase the entropy of the initialization of our random number generator

attribute.name: managedResource
attribute.description: The managed resource this MBean is associated with

attribute.name: maxActiveSessions
attribute.description: The maximum number of active Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

attribute.name: maxInactiveInterval
attribute.description: The default maximum inactive interval for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The descriptive name of this Manager implementation (for logging)

attribute.name: pathname
attribute.description: Path name of the disk file in which active sessions

attribute.name: activeSessions
attribute.description: Number of active sessions at this moment

attribute.name: sessionCounter
attribute.description: Total number of sessions created by this manager

attribute.name: maxActive
attribute.description: Maximum number of active sessions so far

attribute.name: rejectedSessions
attribute.description: Number of sessions we rejected due to maxActive beeing reached

attribute.name: expiredSessions
attribute.description: Number of sessions that expired ( doesn't include explicit invalidations )

attribute.name: processingTime
attribute.description: Time spent doing housekeeping and expiration

attribute.name: duplicates
attribute.description: Number of duplicated session ids generated

operation.name: listSessionIds
operation.description: Return the list of active session ids

operation.name: getSessionAttribute
operation.description: Return a session attribute

parameter.name: sessionId
parameter.description: Id of the session

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: key of the attribute

operation.name: expireSession
operation.description: Expire a session

parameter.name: sessionId
parameter.description: Id of the session

operation.name: getLastAccessedTime
operation.description: Get the last access time

parameter.name: sessionId
parameter.description: Id of the session
